des:
About ZhiTing Tech:
We are committed to the research and development of smart home project, and provide users with a smart home control center - zhiting intelligent system, which can control and manage all kinds of smart devices from different manufacturers across brands and categories.

After binding your zhiting account, you can use the smart speaker to voice control all smart devices you add in "ZhiTing Family Cloud" cloud app. At present, the functions of joint control include: on / off of lamps, brightness adjustment, color temperature adjustment, on / off of switches and on / off of sockets. In the future, we will continue to upgrade and realize more functions.

About how to use:
1. Please download the "ZhiTing Family Cloud" app first. You can download the app by scanning the QR code on the equipment manual, or search, download and install in major application markets.
2. Register and log in to the "ZhiTing Family Cloud" app and add devices to the app.
3. Skill authorization. After adding "ZhiTing Tech" skills, authorize and log in to zhiting account to complete authorization.
4. After successful authorization, the devices added in the "ZhiTing Family Cloud" app will appear in the device list, and you can control them through voice.

For more information, please visit the official website of ZhiTing Tech https://www.zhitingtech.com/
